description: '''TR/ST''' (previously known as '''Trust''') is the Canadian [[electronic music]] project of Robert Alfons. It was formed as a band in 2010 when Alfons met [[Maya Postepski]] of [[Austra (band)|Austra]], but Postepski left in 2012. The project has released five albums: ''[[Trst (album)|TRST]]'' (2012), ''[[Joyland (TR/ST album)|Joyland]]'' (2014), ''[[The Destroyer (Part 1)]]'',  ''[[The Destroyer (Part 2)]]'' (2019) and ''Performance'' (2024). Alfons has also produced remixes for [[Feist (singer)|Feist]], [[Moby]], Zhala and [[Jonna Lee (singer)|Jonna Lee]].
